edu.calpoly.spritely

Interface MouseClickedHandler

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface MouseClickedHandler
    A functional interface for receiving a notification when the mouse is clicked.
    See Also:
    AnimationWindow.setMouseClickedHandler(MouseClickedHandler), SpriteWindow.waitForNextFrame()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mouseClicked(int x, int y)
      Called when the mouse is clicked.

    • Method Detail

      • mouseClicked

        void mouseClicked(int x,
                  int y)
        Called when the mouse is clicked. Note that SpriteWindow scales the x an y coordinate so that they refer to tiles, not pixels.
        Parameters:
        x - The column clicked on (0-based)
        y - The row clicked on (0-based)
